definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate

sentences.english: The effects of attention characteristics on the relationship between endogenous saccade and attention shift.
sentences.chinese: 注意的性質對內源性眼跳與注意關係的影響。

sentences.english: The reaction time, the latency of saccade and the ERPs were recorded as dependent variables.
sentences.chinese: 實驗中記錄反應時，眼跳潛伏期和腦電等指標。

sentences.english: For negative sentence, total fixation time and saccade amplitude are shortest.
sentences.chinese: 否定句注視時間最長，眼跳廣度最小。

definition: vertigo/dizziness/fainting/feeling of swaying, head spinning, lack of balance or floating (e.g. from a stroke)/Taiwan pr. [xuan4 yun1]
to stare/to look blank/to be fixed (of eyes)
to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate
sharp pain/cramp/griping pain/colic/angina, cf 心絞痛|心绞痛
